content: मालिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [माला अस्त्यस्य इनि] {@--1@} Wearing a garland. {@--2@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Crowned or wreathed with, encircled by; समुद्रमालिनी पृथ्वी; so अंशुमलिन्, मरीचिमालिन्, ऊर्मिमालिन् &c. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A gardener. {@--2@} A garland-maker, florist. --नी {@--1@} A female florist, the wife of a garlandmaker. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the city of Campā. {@--3@} A girl seven years old representing Durgā at the Durgā festival. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--5@} The celestial Ganges. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre; see App. {1} {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of the mother of Bibhīshaṇa. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> assumed by Draupadī while residing at the Court of Virāta. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river; <ls>Ś. 3. 7.</ls>
